Quick hello world with Noir to verify an ECDSA signature.

## Compute proof

Change inputs in Prover.toml to match your signature and public key.

```bash
nargo prove
```

It should take approximately 40 seconds to compute the proof.

## Verify proof

```bash
nargo verify
```

It should take approximately 20 second to verify the proof.

## Generate and Deploy contract

```bash
nargo codegen-verifier
```

Deploy contract to the chain of your choice.
```bash
./deploy.sh <rpc-url> <private-key> <etherscan-api-key>
```

### Example

Deployed contract on Sepolia: https://sepolia.etherscan.io/address/0x64e7582b09679562fed8dc4b914ee1f5985d61fc
You can try it out by calling the `verify` function of the contract.

Example inputs:
- Proof: ``

- public inputs: []
